segments.text: You didn't show up to my performance last night ! Some kind of friend you are !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me a chance to explain . I was no my way and I had an accident .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . You look like you're all black and blue .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am fine . In fact , I don't have a scratch on me or my vehicle . But the other guy is in critical condition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'm serious . I'm really sorry about missing your concert .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I misjudged you . I hope you can forgive me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course I forgive you . What are friends for ? Now , what am I going to do for that other guy ?
segments.speaker: S2
